item.description:
This is the start of the unofficial Wedeln Golf League at Leo J. Martin Memorial Golf Club.

Leo Martin Memorial Golf Course

85 Park Road, Weston, MA

Leo J. is easily accessible from Boston, anywhere on Route 128 or from points west on the Mass Pike, It is located at the Mass Pike / Route 128 / Route 30 Interchange in Weston.

 

Playing 9 holes after 4PM costs a whopping $12. Tee times are first come, first serve basis. My plan is to arrive between 4 and 5 PM and play with whomever shows up. There is also a driving range there, Lessons are available on a scheduled basis.

This course (and its sister course in Canton, Ponkapoag) are run and maintained by the Massachusetts Department of Conservation and Recreation. It is a great place for beginners to play.

To play, you should have:

- Golf clubs (although they do rent clubs)

- Proper golf shoes

- Clothing requirements are rather lax and unenforced there, but most people wear shorts and a collared shirt.

- You are by no means obligated to play every week. But I will schedule this through the end of September.

Please contact me if you have any questions, issues, or concerns.

Regards,

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me by the Pro Shop
item.name: Golf @ Leo J. Martin Memorial Golf Club - Weston
